title: Handle a Partial Power Outage
description: A power outage affects one section of the venue during an event, causing lights and concession stands to lose power.

tasks.description: Receive reports of a power outage in a specific area.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the outage is affecting the west side of the venue.

tasks.description: Verify that the backup generators have activated for emergency lighting.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms that emergency lights are on in the affected area.

tasks.description: Dispatch electricians to the affected electrical room to diagnose the issue.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends the on-site electricians to investigate.

tasks.description: Dispatch staff to the area to provide assistance and information to guests.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends guest services staff to the dark concourse to help guests.
